Package br.inatel.dragrace.handler

Class ControllerExceptionHandler

java.lang.Object
br.inatel.dragrace.handler.ControllerExceptionHandler
@ControllerAdvice @ResponseBody public class ControllerExceptionHandler extends Object
Class to handle all the exceptions and give a message to the client
Since:
09/09/2022
